TEXT.S:
GuyanaGuyanau Guyana (u sulit nu Hulam: ) sa i labu nu teban-timulan nu Amilika, itiza i 5 00 N, 59 00 W. u ahebal nu lala'mapulung sa izaw ku 214,969 km2u ahebal nu lala'aysa izaw ku 196,849 km2, u ahebal nu nanumaysa izaw ku 18,120 km2hamin nu tademawan sa 735,909. kakalukan umah sa 8.40%, kilakilangan umah sa 77.40%, zumaay henay umah sa 14.20%. caay kamu cabaya a kanatla nu Taywan. :Cooperative Republic of Guyana Cooperative Republic of Guyana (, kamu nu UK: Cooperative Republic of Guyana), tadangangan han u Kaya-na (Guyana, itida i Nanmei-cuoamisan, Nanmei-cuou Igu acacay ku kamu nu kanatal nuheni, u United Kingdoma tademawan a kanatal.[1]
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Georgetown.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 23 bulad 2 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Irfaan Ali (Yielban.Ali 路), 1980 a mihca 4 a bulad 25 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Guyanaayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihca 8 bulad 2 demiad.
cunliu cunli nu Guyanaayza sa ci Mark Anthony Phillips, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihcaan 8 bulad 2 demiad.
likisi nu Guyana1498路 cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku walu (1498) a mihcaan Cristoforo Colombo (Keli-seduo-fu.kelun-pu' .) makaadih ku Kaya-na (Guyanaatu biyaw a niyadu'sa, Europe (O-cuo ) a tademaw mabulawtu a tayni i tini.. 191814 nikudan satu nu tuluay a se-ci nina kitidaan makakutay kunuheni naw Ing-kuo (United Kingdom,He-lan (Netherlands, Fa-kuo (Francea debung, katukuh tu sabaw tu siwa (19) a se-ci, cacay a malebut walu a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku sepat (1814) a mihcaan Ing-kuo (United Kingdom, He-lan Netherlands, Fa-kuo (Francenina tuluay a kanatal masasulit tu sakabenisan a kiyaku, Kaya-na (Guyanaa niyaduan tatenga u Ing-kuo( United Kingdommabulaway a tademaw kumi kuwanay, sisa pangangan han u Ing-kuo (United KingdomGuyanahan. 1961(Guyana)19665261970223 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku cacay (1961) a mihcaan unuheni tu kumikuwanay, samad han nuheni u Kaya-na (Guyanahan. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku enem (1966) a mihcaan lima (5) a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku enem (26) a demiad misiteked, cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan (1970) a mihcaan tusa (2) a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku tulu (23) a demiad patideng tu Kaya-na (Guyanakapulungan a kanatal.[2]
tademaw801834 Kaya-na (Guyanacebedcebetan ku buyu'buyu'an, tada adiditu ku tademaw nuheni walu a mang ku tademaw, Ing-kuo (United Kingdommahka mabulaw kunuheni namaka Fai-cuo ( Africamicakay tu kalung a tademaw tatayni mikaykun, cacay a malebut walu a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku sepat (1834) a mihcaan malapes ku kalung a kawawan.
mabulaway pasayda i Naya ( Asiaa In-tu' (Indiaatu wali timul nu Asiaa kitidaan, kiyakun ku tatayni itini nu yasuya a mamikuli a tademaw, sisa Kaya-na (Guyananu sakaliwmah atu baba'tuan taneng matulin amapalekal, sisa Kaya-na (Guyanamala katuuday nu binacadan a kakitidaan. [3]
sakaudip4.4%86% Kaya-na (Guyanamaka kutkut tu simal, sakaudip han macakat tu sepat.sepat (4.4%) a kilac, kasenusa macakat tu walu a bataan idaw ku enem a kilac (86%) (Guyana) Namei-cuo (Amilikaanamisan u Winai-zuyla (Venezuela, u kitakit satabakiay nu suku nu simal a kakitidaan, atu mababiyaway a kanatal Kaya-na (Guyana201580%路Winston Jordan itini i tusa a malabut cacay a bataan idaw ku lima (2015) a mihcaan makaadih tu simal, Kaya-na (Guyanaitida i ce'tawnu capiyan, kacaledesan a udatan a demiad, kilangkilangan ku labu makaalatu walu a bataan (80%) nu kilacan, idaw ku lui lala', kim, tan, mukim atu ba'ba'tuwan, caycen pu'cenci Winston Jordan (Wuen-se-tun.Ciyaw-dan 路) .
anumahida awni kudkudan tu simal ku sapikeda tu cunlicen, patideng tu namaka lilis nu bayu besud sa katukuh i labu a dadan nu kawsu kunlu, saka ngaay mikukud tu ba'tu. IMF nika, adidi' ku sakaudip nu Kaya-na (Guyana, IMF patudu'an, simal itini i iciba' anika lawlawan misuayaw tu Kaya-na (Guyananu sakaudip tabaki kunika lawilawan. 20222 Kaya-na (Guyananu sihu idaw kunipi sausisan, tusa a malebut tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (2022) a mihcaan nu saka tusa i bayuay a simal tuni kalingatuan silacul han , tu mihmihcaan sipasimel atu sapi cidekaw nu cacukaymasen macunus macunus, nina kalisiw taneng ku sapalekalaw tuni kiyakuan a kalisiwan, sakay tini i kanatal nu sapatideng tu sakasilacul, saka talaw anu malawlaw ku nidang nu simal mawada' ku sakaudip nu binawlan.
kitidaanwalian mitepal tu Suli-nan (Suriname, timulan sibiyaw tu Pa-si (Brazil, nutipan mitepal tu Winai-zuila (Venezuela, amisan mitepal tu Tasi-yung. Kaya-na (Guyanaatu Suli-nan (Surinameatu Winai-zuila (Venezuelaidaw kunika cinglaw tu babenisan nu kanatal a lala'. - micidek ku Winai-zuila (Venezuelasakamusa i Essequibo (Ayse-kueypuo ) sauwac nutipanay a lala' - nutipan a Kaya-na Guyananu Winai-zuila (Venezuela. Kaya-na (Guyanaamica kuni kai Amilikaan (Nanmei-cuo ), u Nanmei-cuokanatal a tademaw, nika i laylay nu likisi atu Caribbean (Ciale-pihay ) masasungaay kunuheni.
Guyanas a kakitidaan ( Kaya-na) u Guyanas a kakitidaan caay ka Guyana a kanatal. :Las Guayanas:The Guianas:Guyanes:Guyana's:Guianas Kaya-na (Guyanakamu nu Sipan-ya (Spain: Las Guayanas, Igy (United Kingdom: The Guianas, kamu nu Fa-iy (France: Guyanes, kamu i nu He-lan (Netherlands: Guyana's, kamu nu putawya-iy (Portugal: Guianas) u timulan nu Amilikaan (NanMei-cuo ) amisan, nutipan amisan a niyaduan, pababenis han tu pina a kanatal atu kitidaan. 17 nuayawan nu Columbus (Kelun-pu' ) a zitay, Kaya-na (Guyanaa niyaduan nu tademaw u Ciale-pi a tademawatu Alawa-ke' a tademawitini i sabaw tu pitu (17) a se-ci nikudan nina niyadu' hamaw han nu O-cuo kanatalmibenis u kabulawan a kitidaan, mahida aydaay a wayway.
nina niyadu'mibatad tu yadahay nu Amilikaan (Nanmei-cuo ) a kanatal (mitulinnay a kanatal u Winai-zuyla (Venezuela, Kelun-piya (Columbiaatu Pa-si Brazil, lalangawan, cence misiteked tu lilisay a Amazon Basin (Yama-sun penti, Amilikaan (Nanmei-cuo ) nu timulan, nutipan timulan a kanatal, micapiya tu Caile-pi (Caribbeana kakitidaan.[4]
Gayyana buyu'""(Mount Roraima) idaw ku tankun fudaw(Mount Roraima " pingangana nu Kaya-na buyu'itida i Amilikaan (Nanmai-cuo ) Winai-zuyla (Venezuelaa Kaya-na Guyana a buyu', i kitakitay nu samukasiay a lala', masa enal ku tungduh nu buyu', mahida u masikakuay a tabakiay nu takalan. 236. makaala'tu tusa (2) a walewalen a mihcaan nu laylay a Kaya-na (Guyana a buyu', makaalatu tulu (3) a mang nu pinfunkunli, milauyd tu enemay (6) a kanatalan, nuni kasa pucu'sa nu lala'an, nika sademiadan mapaudad mapabali. ""1002560 nikahetikan nu mabawbaw nu lala' atu ba'tu, u atekakay satu a ba'tu kuliwan i masaenalay, mahida aydaay a mutidengay nu ladenman a "' takal a buyu", itida i Kaya-na (Guyana) a buyu', idaw henay ku cacaya a lasubu (100) misengiay tina takalan a buyu', idaw ku satabakiay ninabuyu' a takalan makaala tu tusa a malebut lima a lasubu enem a bataan (2560) a kunce nu buyu', aydahan mapatukitu i kitakit nu lahad nuni pahetikan nu babalaki. "" mapangangan nu niyadu'ay u " Te'pu-e"a masaenalay nu buyu', u kacaledesan nu masalahatay a kilangkilangan, liklik matahap nu mahida u kupaay apiyang nu latem, lilis han idaw kumilibetay nu caayya ka adih nu kacaledesan a langawlangawan, nu panaay a cascas a cascas nu buyu' cikciken malaadidiay a buyu', bataden amiadih mahida uibayuay a adidi'ay a subal.[5] --Angel Falls nuayawan nina buyu' han, idaw kuni culimekan tu satabakiay nu kitakit a cascas-u tian-Secascasan (Angel Falls, ). Canaima National Park97916! namakabuhangay a mulecisay kasenun sananay mahetikay a nanum u Anhela-pupu' (Anhee-cascasa ngangan, itida i Winai-zuyla (Venezuelasatabakiay a lihalay dadiputan a Kanay-ma kuocia kunyung (Canai-ma National Park, talakaw han makaala tu siwa a labsubu pitu a bataan idaw ku siwa ( 979) a cunce, u Nicia-lakuo "Nicaragua" cascasnu sabaw tu enem (16) a bey! "" dadiputen a kitidaan nika sasungaliwan nu sauwac a nanum, talakaway ku buyu', pa'ngaw han idaw ku kacaledesan a langaw nu kilangkilangan atu ahebalay nu lutuk, unikasi nganganay nu Tanse-pupu' (Angel Falls a cascasan, idaw henay ku yadahay a cascasan, sipangangan han tu "cascas a niyadu'an".[6]
